profile_positions.description:
The S/4 Release Management product team at Shell is accountable for the tooling, strategy, scheduling, coordination and deployment of S/4 project releases. We define, deploy and constantly improve the quality and stability for Shell S/4 projects and cutover to operations. This is achieved though robust release management practices that evolve with each new project, the end goal is to have a one size fits all process that can be deployed for any new demand regardless of scale, budget and complexity. 
My team works closely with various delivery teams and stakeholders across diverse projects and locations in ERP at Shell. 
•	Release Planning & Coordination
•	Tooling Management
•	Integration Management
•	Automated Testing
•	Defining and owning production change process and change controls (Project Phase)
•	Change Management hand over to operation
•	Portfolio and Service Management activities for S/4 Applications that support release management
